attributes.action: make voting in General Elections and Local Government Elections Compulsory.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The turnout in General Elections and Local Government Elections are never much more than 50 percent, if that.  In an effort designed to obtain the maximum input from eligible voters, compulsory voting would enable the elected government or party to have the confidence that it is reflecting the wishes of the whole electorate and not just some of them.

Compulsory voting is the law in a number of other countries around the world and sems to be well accepted where that is the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
